document_data.mainbody:
irileth was a woman that lived on the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR.
She was married to a man named Benryn, who loved her very much..
In the , Mirileth and Benryn had a stay at Waukeens Rest, an inn situated along the Risen Road. Mirileth took with them a gold ring, which was a dowry gift for Mirileths sisters upcoming wedding. The two unfortunately got into an argument and were separated for a brief time.
The couples trip met with disaster when goblin cultists slaughtered the inns guests and set it ablaze. Mirileth was caught outside during the raid and forced into an isolated area. She was cut down and killed, unable to reunite with her husband in her final moments.
